HPI 8085 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1990 JTC Series Winner/2nd Place K. Hoshino/T. Suzuki

As mentioned in the details of HPI 8023, Hoshino & Suzuki were the JTC Group A champions in the GT-R's first year of competition. There's no indication which race this car might be from but it's definitely not Round 1 (that's HPI 8023). It's also probably not from the season-ending Inter-tec 500km at Fuji. That's based on this comparison to the 1:12 scale version of the Inter-tec car on HPI's blog. The 1:12 has an extra decal on the driver's side front fender as seen in the 3rd photo and a roof-mounted aerial

Anyway, who cares. It's a great model. :lol: I don't know why I get caught up in these details sometimes. I guess it's a good distraction.
